00017 ## @package settings
00018 #  Holds the settings class required by the widgets

00020 import xml.etree.ElementTree as ET
00021 import os
00022 
00023 class settings(dict): 
00024     """Just a container for most settings shared between several objects.
00025     Settings that are automatically defined:
00026     - basedir
00027     - last working directory (lwd) - initially usr/worked - but can be overriden
00028     by settings from the loaded model (project.xml)
00029     
00030     Settings that are loaded from XML files:
00031     - menu widget ??? - put the path to resources in the XML file menu.xml ???
00032     - upper toolbox widget ??? - same as for the menu widget ???
00033     - canvas widget
00034     - XML Editor
00035     - console
00036     - status bar???"""
00037     
00038     def __init__(self):
00039         """TODO:: define actions ..."""
00040         dict.__init__(self)
00041                 
00042                 # settings to be loaded from files (or determined)
00043         self["basedir"] = os.getcwd().replace("bin", "") # assumes that the main script starts from the
00044                                                          # bin directory
00045         self["lwd"] = os.getcwd().replace("bin", "")     # last working directory - priority:
00046                                                          # 1. load from project (trunk) settings file and only if it is present. 
00047                                                          # 2. use etc/paths.xml "LastWorkingDir" element
00048                                                          # 3. use self["basedir"] which assumes the same location as initall.py script
00049 
00050         # ----------------------------- widgets settings ----------------------------- 
00051 
00052         # Menu
00053         self["menuIconsPath"] = os.path.join(self["basedir"], "resources/icons16x16/menu") # add possibilities for multiple resolutions        
00054         self["menuXMLPath"]   = os.path.join(self["basedir"], "etc/gui/menus.xml") 
00055         self["menu"]          = {"icons":{}}
00056         
00057         # Upper toolbox
00058         self["upperToolBoxIconsPath"] = os.path.join(self["basedir"], "resources/icons22x22/uptoolbox")
00059         self["upperToolBoxXMLPath"]   = os.path.join(self["basedir"], "etc/gui/uppertoolbox.xml")
00060         self["upperToolBox"]          = {"icons":{}}
00061         
00062         # Canvas
00063         self["canvasXMLPath"] = os.path.join(self["basedir"], "etc/gui/canvas.xml")
00064         self["canvas"]        = {}
00065         # ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00066         
00067         # other useful paths
00068         self["extraModulesPath"] = {} # relative/absolute paths???
00069         self["XMLPath"] = os.path.join(self["basedir"], "etc/paths.xml") # canvas.xml and others ???
00070         
00071         self.__parseXMLData()
00072 
00073     def __parseXMLData(self): # canvas.xml and others ???
00074         """Parses the default paths.xml file into the self["extraModulesPath"]"""
00075 
00076         tree = ET.parse(self["XMLPath"])
00077         root = tree.getroot()
00078         
00079         # modules:
00080         
00081         for i in root.getiterator('module'):
00082             self["extraModulesPath"][i[0].text] = i[1].text
00083             
00084         # lwd:
00085         
00086     def addXMLData(self, data, element):
00087         """Adds data to XML file paths.xml"""
00088         
00089         tree = ET.parse(self["XMLPath"])
00090         root = tree.getroot() 
00091 
00092         if (root.find(data).tag == data):
00093 
00094             if data == 'modules':
00095                 self["extraModulesPath"][element['name']] = element['path']
00096                 module = tree.SubElement(root.find(data), 'module')
00097                 name   = tree.SubElement(module, 'name')
00098                 name.text = element['name']
00099                 path   = tree.SubElement(module, 'path')
00100                 path.text = element['path']
00101             
00102             if data == "lwd":
00103                 self['lwd'] = element
00104                 lwd = root.find(data)
00105                 lwd.text = element
00106          
00107             tree.write(self["XMLPath"], encoding = "UTF-8")
00108          
00109     def removeXMLData(self, data, element):
00110         """Removes data to XML file paths.xml"""
00111         
00112         tree = ET.parse(self["XMLPath"])
00113         root = tree.getroot() 
00114 
00115         if (root.find(data).tag == data) and (element in self["extraModulesPath"]):
00116             if data == 'modules':
00117                 del self["extraModulesPath"][element]
00118                 module = root.find('modules')
00119                 for i in module.findall('module'):   
00120                     if i[0].text == element:
00121                         module.remove(i)
00122             
00123             if data == "lwd": # resets to default /usr/worked
00124                 self['lwd'] = 'usr/worked'
00125                 lwd = root.find(data)
00126                 lwd.text = 'usr/worked'
00127                 
00128             tree.write(self["XMLPath"], encoding = "UTF-8")
00129         
00130     def __call__(self, project.xml): # must define
00131         """Call the settings instance with the project.xml settings in order to 
00132         override some of its attributes with the information found in it."""
00133         pass

00136     obj = settings()
